name: Kadiri Daniel
bio: A passionate web developer with expertise in creating dynamic and responsive web applications. With 3 years of experience in the industry, I have honed my skills in various technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Next.js.

experiences.title: Junior Frontend Dev
experiences.description: Designing and implementing websites,Maintaining the company’s website and optimized the web functionalities, and creating better user interface,Executing tasks by working with a team,

experiences.title: intern / Junior Frontend Dev
experiences.description: Maintained the company’s website and optimized the web functionalities, focusing on better user interface,Utilized React and tailwind CSS framework in carrying out the web maintenance,Developed strong analytical skills and the ability to solve practical user interface problems.

experiences.title: Project Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Conducted data-driven research and analysis to optimize operational processes and decision-making ,focus on operation research methodologies in engineering  Utilized data-driven approaches to support 120+ aspiring engineering students in comprehending the key concepts and applications of engineering principles.Developed strong analytical skills and the ability to solve practical engineering problems under minimal supervision.

experiences.title: Bachelors of Engineering in Mechanical Engineering

projects.discription: A web app designed to help passengers easily lodge flight complaints. Users can submit their issues, track complaint progress, and receive real-time responses, all in one chat. The app ensures swift resolution by connecting passengers directly with airline support teams.
projects.title: lodge flight complain web App

projects.discription: A restaurant platform that takes orders directly through WhatsApp for a hassle-free experience. Customers can browse the menu, place orders, and customize dishes all within the chat.
projects.title: Resturant App

projects.discription: A unique platform that facilitates seamless trading through WhatsApp. It allows users to  negotiate deals, and finalize transactions all within the familiar chat interface.
projects.title: Crypto exchange App

projects.discription: A unique platform that facilitates seamless chating of workers. It allows users to  communicate, astill a work in progress.
projects.title: Chat App

projects.discription: A clothing e-commerce platform that lets you shop for desired clothing. Customers can browse collections, ask for sizing recommendations, and place orders right in the site. With personalized style advice and instant updates on deliveries, it makes fashion shopping easy and interactive. Secure payment options and order tracking ensure a smooth experience from start to finish.
